text: The Lincoln Z is a mid-size luxury sedan. It has been made from 2022 to the present day by Lincoln Motor Company. It is made for the Chinese market. == History and Features == In 2021, Lincoln showed the Lincoln Zephyr concept car at the Auto Shanghai. In 2021, Lincoln changed the car name from Zephyr to Z, and they showed it at Auto Guangzhou. == References == Category:Sedans Category:Lincoln automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Lincoln Z
